title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. XII, pt. 426 - Minimum Standards For Firefighting Personnel In The State Of New York
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. XII, pt. 426 - Minimum Standards For Firefighting Personnel In The State Of New York

State Regulations
§ 426.1 - Purpose
§ 426.2 - Standards for certification of fire training programs
§ 426.3 - Facilities and equipment required for fire training programs
§ 426.4 - Minimum qualifications for instructor certification
§ 426.5 - Basic training, time completion requirements
§ 426.6 - Minimum basic fire training for probationary and nonpermanent fire-fighters
§ 426.7 - In-service fire training
§ 426.8 - Advanced in-service training
§ 426.9 - Promotional/supervisory qualifications and training
§ 426.10 - Exemptions; revocation

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. XII, pt. 426

Statutory authority: Executive Law, §
159-d

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
